title: Villain
lyrics:
Why am I a narcissistic asshole
Feeding off everyone and sucking out their soul
Another pill to take
Another drink to drink
Another bitch to fuck

This is fun, this is fun

Another song to sing

Roll up some shit to smoke

Lets throw another party

Everybody overdose



I am a villain

A fucking villain



Bang your fucking head

Until you're fucking dead

Never met a problem I couldn't solve with alcohol

Bang your fucking head

Until you're fucking dead

If you got a problem kill em all kill em all



I got some cash to throw

We got some rails to blow

Your girlfriend wants to fuck

Tell her meet me at the show

Another song to sing

Roll up some shit to smoke

Lets throw another party

Everybody overdose



I am a villain

A fucking villain



If you still about it COME AND GET IT



Bang your fucking head

Until you're fucking dead

Never met a problem I couldn't solve with alcohol

Bang your fucking head

Until you're fucking dead

If you got a problem kill em all kill em all



We could all die tomorrow and it wouldn't mean shit



Another pill

Another drink

Another bitch

Another party

This is never ending



She wanna fuck me

Cuz she knows that I'm a felon

I say welcome to the party



Another pill

Another bitch

Another party

This is never ending



She wanna fuck me
